New Records: LeBron James is the oldest player in NBA history to record back-to-back games with: 20+ PTS, 10+ AST
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers suffered a very surprising 115-103 loss to fall to 4-3 in their first seven games of the new season
Others: LeBron James finished with 20 points, eight rebounds, 11 assists and two steals while shooting 7/16 from the field and 1/2 from the three-point range in 40 minutes
